data.name: Jack & Detectives
data.detailed_description:
Find Jack out among us.

This game is a turn-based deduction game.
Features are:
  • No talking allowed.
  • No player elimination.
  • 10 minutes per game.

Jack


A serial killer who hides in the dark of night.
Win if you don't get the most vote.

Detective


A private detective commissioned by the City of London Police.
If you can get Jack the most votes, you win.

Jack Maniac


A psychopath who cooperates with Jack the Ripper.
Win if Jack doesn't get the most nominations. (you also win if you get the most votes)
Jack Maniac don't appear in every game.

Game Flow

Start the game by placing your pieces where you want them on the London tiles.
When everyone has placed their pieces, the first murder will occur (or not).
The detectives around the murder scene become potential suspects. Who are the allies and who are the enemies...?
When the second murder occurs, will you be able to guess the murderer?

What you can do with this game

■ You can play against players from all over the country in online matches!
Play against other players from all over the country to increase your rate.
Play against players from all over the country to increase your rate. When you reach a certain rate, you will get a rank.

■ Room Match with friends!
Create a room and play against your friends!
Of course, you can customize the rules in room matches as well.

■ Review the match with replays!
You can replay the game to see how Jack (the werewolf) performed.

■ Play against the AI!
This is a great way to practice by yourself before playing online.
The game has a mode to practice against the AI.

This game is recommended for

  • People who like Social Deduction games.
  • People who are not good at talking.
  • People who want to play board games online.
  • People who like games where the game is won in a short time.
  • People who want to enjoy board games with friends.

data.short_description: Find Jack out among us.Players are divided into "Jack the Ripper" and "Detective" and try to guess who is Jack.You cannot talk to other players in this game, so you must deduce who is Jack by relying solely on the actions of each player.Each game takes 10 minutes.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2G Hz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: 2G Hz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal or OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
